price: ហើយចូរអ្នកប្រគល់ការទុកចិត្ដលើអល់ឡោះ។ គ្រប់គ្រាន់ ហើយអល់ឡោះជាអ្នកគាំពារ។
arabic: وَتَوَكَّلۡ عَلَى ٱللَّهِۚ وَكَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ وَكِيلٗا

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: watawakkal ʿalā al-lahi wakafā bil-lahi wakīlan
